name: Neon Tide (itch)
description:
Features: 

  • Mature content (suggested but unseen nudity, violence, blood)
  • Video cut scenes
  • Story with music and sound design

The year is 2048.  A virus known as "Neon Tide" spreads throughout robots in an unknown fashion.  You play as three characters who's journey's are to unlock the cause of the virus and stopping it from spreading further.
